channel.title: ~ [APP] TrigunScape Development Team [APP] ~
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg146/Fantasykik/Triggeen.jpg[/img][/center]
[b]- [/b] [b]Hello[/b], mates. I have decided to make [b]T[/b][b]rigun[/b][b]S[/b][b]cape[/b], Maybe making it dedicated, And it will be the last server I make before I [u][i]retire[/i][/u] and just answer questions, post tutorials, play/test servers, etc. on [url=http://www.Moparscape.org/smf]www.Moparscape.org/smf[/url].
[b]- [/b] [b]Now[/b].. I am starting "[b]TrigunScape[/b]" From scratch, and I need people to find a source for me, Become forum administrator, coder, Forum creator, etc. So I will be assigning jobs below, and all you have to do is fill them out the best you can, cross your fingers, and hope you get accepted. (Most likely, Unless I think your not TS Material) And note, You can only fill out 2 applications MAXIMIUM, so keep that in mind. And please don't spam this topic with questions, The information I am putting out for you will be more then enough to answer whatever nooby question you may have, so just don't do it!
[b]_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b]_____
[center][size=25pt]Positions Avaible[/size][/center]
[b][size=13pt]TrigunScape Head Coders[/size][/b] [code] [b] What experience do you have coding? -[/b] [b] Give me a example of your work - [/b] [b] Have you ever owned a server? - [/b] [b] If so, whats the most amount of people you have ever had on your server? - [/b] [b] Do you know what C++ is? - [/b] [b] How long have you played MoparScape? - [/b] [b] Are you a noob? (Final Question) - [/b][/code]
[b][size=13pt]TrigunScape Cod[i]ee[/i]s[/size][/b] [code] [b] What experience do you have coding? - [/b] [b] Give me a example of your work - [/b] [b] Have you ever owned a server? - [/b] [b] How long have you played MoparScape? [/b] [b] Do you know how to add any special commands? [/b] [b] Are you a noob? - [/b][/code]
[size=17pt][b]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b][/size]
[b][size=13pt]TrigunScape Head Administration[/size][/b] [code] [b] What experience do you have .. Administrating XD? - [/b] [b] What would you do as a Administrator on our server? - [/b] [b] How long have you played MoparScape? - [/b] [b] Give us a example of some rules you might enforce... - [/b] [b] Do you know all the basic server commands? - [/b] [b] Are you a noob? - [/b] [/code]
[b][size=13pt]TrigunScape Administration[/size][/b] [code] [b] What experience do you have Administrating? - [/b] [b] What would you do as a Administrator on our server? - [/b] [b] How long have you played MoparScape? - [/b] [b] Are you a noob? - [/b][/code]
[size=17pt][b]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b][/size]
[b][size=13pt]TrigunScape Head Moderation Team[/size][/b] [code] [b] Do you know what your job as a Moderator is? - [/b] [b] Do you know what commands you are limited to as a Moderator? - [/b] [b] What other servers have you Moderated? - [/b] [b] How long have you played MoparScape? - [/b] [b] Are you a noob? - [/b] [/code]
[b][size=13pt]TrigunScape Moderation Team[/size][/b] [code] [b] Do you know what your job as a Moderator is? - [/b] [b] What other servers have you Moderated? - [/b] [b] How long have you played MoparScape? - [/b] [b] Are you a noob? - [/b][/code]
[size=17pt][b]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b][/size]
[b][size=13pt]Forum Creation Team[/size][/b] [code] [b] Have you ever worked with PHPbb. or SMF? - [/b] [b] If so, Give us a example of your work. - [/b] [b] Can you handle most orders? - [/b] [b] How long have you played MoparScape? - [/b] [b] Will you work atleast 1 hour a day on the forums? - [/b] [b] Are you a noob? - [/b] [/code]
[b][size=13pt]Forum Administration Team[/size][/b] [code] [b] What experience do you have Administrating Forums? - [/b] [b] Have you ever Administrated any large forums? (5000+) -[/b] [b] Do you have correct spelling, grammer, etc (like mine :) )? -[/b] [b] Will you read the rules, enforce them, and only lock/sticky topics if Necessary? -[/b] [b] How long have you played MoparScape? -[/b] [b] Are you a noob? -[/b] [/code]
[b][size=13pt]Forum Moderation Team[/size][/b] [code] [b] Are you aware of your powers as a Moderator on our forums? - [/b] [b] Have you ever Moderatored any large forums? (5000+) - [/b] [b] Do you have correct spelling, grammer, etc (like mine :) )? - [/b] [b] Will you read the rules, enforce them, and only lock topics if Necessary? - [/b] [b] How long have you played MoparScape? [/b] [b] Are you a noob? - [/b] [/code]
[size=17pt][b]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b][/size]
[center][size=25pt]Positions Took[/size][/center]
[b][size=13pt]TrigunScape Head Coders[/size][/b]
[b] Akanaz M A R T Y ---[/b]
[b][size=13pt]TrigunScape Cod[i]ee[/i]s[/size][/b]
[b] mrx229 zootu --- --- --- ---[/b]
[b][size=13pt]TrigunScape Head Administration[/size][/b]
[b] Kiing-pl0x x0 0wn ---[/b]
[b][size=13pt]TrigunScape Administration[/size][/b]
[b] --- --- --- --- --- ---[/b]
[b][size=13pt]TrigunScape Head Moderation Team[/size][/b]
[b] --- --- ---
[b][size=13pt]TrigunScape Moderation Team[/size][/b] [b] --- --- --- --- --- ---[/b]
[b][size=13pt]Forum Creation Team[/size][/b] [b] M A R T Y --- ---
[b][size=13pt]Forum Administration Team[/size][/b]' [b] --- --- --- --- --- ---[/b] [b][size=13pt]Forum Moderation Team[/size][/b] [b] --- --- --- --- --- ---[/b] [b][size=13pt]Coolest Topic People[/size][/b] [b] Milk and Java™

item.title: ~ [APP] TrigunScape Development Team [APP] ~
item.dc:creator: @frogboy227 frogboy227
item.description:
@frogboy227 wrote:

What experience do you have … Administrating XD? - owned a server coded servers and i no how to handle noobs that ask for stuff if i no them punch em in the face if i dont and im on server mute em or temp ban em
What would you do as a Administrator on our server? - i would help you with ideas on codeing i just wont have much time to code for you thats y i am not asking for head coder
How long have you played MoparScape? - about 5 years off and on
Give us a example of some rules you might enforce… - no asking for mod or admin if some1 does ask mute or ban them if ther eis no swaearing mute them if they get mad at the server ban them gfor disrespecting your hard work
Do you know all the basic server commands? - ::master ::home ::saveme ::pk ::pkbox ::edge
Are you a noob? - no…

Read full topic

Have you ever owned a server? - yes i scripted my own from tru3scape source
How long have you played MoparScape? about 3years
Do you know how to add any special commands? yes i do… depends on what though
Are you a noob? - Yes… also i like cheese

item.title: ~ [APP] TrigunScape Development Team [APP] ~
item.dc:creator: @M_A_R_T_Y M A R T Y
item.description:
@M_A_R_T_Y wrote:

Forum Creation Team

[b] Have you ever worked with PHPbb. or SMF? - All. Mostly vBulletin.Im great with it. [/b] [b] If so, Give us a example of your work. - My site i own - gamingunlocked.net[/b] [b] Can you handle most orders? - Yes, im great with forums.[/b] [b] How long have you played MoparScape? - 7 months or so.[/b] [b] Will you work atleast 1 hour a day on the forums? - Whenever im on, probably 4-5 hours.[/b] [b] Are you a noob? - With forums? Hell no. And im also a pretty good server coder.[/b]

I might be more comfortable with ipb,vBulletin though. I can supply you with a vBulletin license if you don’t believe i have a license you can PM me for a pic…

I also will probably be able to set up a serverstatus for you

Read full topic
